text.name: InternalServerError
text.value: An internal error occurred during your request!

text.name: ValidationNarrativeTitle
text.value: The following errors were detected during validation.

text.name: DefaultErrorDetail
text.value: Error detail not sent by server.

text.name: DefaultErrorDetail401
text.value: You should be authenticated (sign in) in order to perform this operation.

text.name: DefaultErrorDetail403
text.value: You are not allowed to perform this operation.

text.name: DefaultErrorDetail404
text.value: The resource requested could not found on the server.

text.name: EntityNotFound
text.value: There is no entity {0} with id = {1}!
